mapper.select: select * from news order by no desc and use_state='o'
select * from news where no=(select min(no) from news where no>#{no}) and top_state='x' and use_state='o'

select * from news where top_state ='o' and use_state like concat('%',#{use_state},'%') order by no desc;

update news set useState=#{use_state} where no=#{no}
